description:
Stay classy, prAna friends (with a little help from the Tinline Shirt). This classic dobby shirt for him can carry you through the season in refined style, whether you're pairing it with jeans for watching the weekend game or chinos for work.

Made using a soft, sustainable fabric blend and offering up both slim and standard fits, this shirt deserves a spot in closets everywhere.
name: Prana Tinline Shirt - Slim - Mens
